statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.Name, CC.SortOrder, CC.Name, AA.Name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID , AA.CategoryID , AA.Gender , AA.Name , AA.Description
, BB.Name as CategoryName , CC.Name as GenderName
FROM dbo.TScrapSize AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TScrapCategory BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CategoryID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Gender = CC.Code AND CC.ParentCode = 'Gender' WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
AND AA.CategoryID = #CategoryID#
AND AA.Gender = #Gender#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapSize WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapSize WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SiteID = #SiteID# AND CategoryID = #CategoryID# AND Gender = #Gender# AND Name = #Name#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapSize ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, SiteID, CategoryID, Gender, Name, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #SiteID#, #CategoryID#, #Gender#, #Name#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TScrapSize SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, SiteID = #SiteID# , CategoryID = #CategoryID# , Gender = #Gender# , Name = #Name# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
